title: For You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Maki-chan, here you go!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Those are some heavy books. What are they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I thought they might help you with composing music, so I brought them over!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hanayo-chan mentioned that you’ve been in a slump lately.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hanayo... But hey, thanks. Can I take a look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Please, go ahead!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>...? These aren’t music composition textbooks...? Art, a photo book, historical fiction, manga?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I didn’t know what textbooks would be useful, so I just picked out things I thought you might enjoy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maybe I should have chosen a book about the world’s greatest composers or something...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No, this is fine. Hey, you must be tired from carrying all this. Wanna go have some tea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Then, you can tell me what parts of the books you chose that you like. I’m curious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Y-yeah! There are lots of parts I love, zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
